verses.verse: <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> with the <S%G1100>tongues<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> and of <S%G32>angels,<s%> but do not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> I have <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G2278>noisy<s%> <S%G5475>gong<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G214>clanging<s%> <S%G2950>cymbal.<s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> [the gift of] <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> and <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%> and <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> as to <S%G3179>remove<s%> <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> but do not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G5595>give<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G5225>possessions<s%> to <S%G5595>feed<s%> [the poor,] and <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G3860>deliver<s%> my <S%G4983>body<s%> to be <S%G2545>burned,<s%> but do not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> it <S%G5623>profits<s%> me <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>
<S%G26>Love<s%> is <S%G3114>patient,<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> is <S%G5541>kind,<s%> [and] is not <S%G2206>jealous;<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> does not <S%G4068>brag<s%> [and] is not <S%G5448>arrogant,<s%>

does not <S%G807>act<s%> <S%G807>unbecomingly;<s%> it does not <S%G2212>seek<s%> its <S%G1438>own,<s%> is not <S%G3947>provoked,<s%> does not <S%G3049>take<s%> into <S%G3049>account<s%> a <S%G2556>wrong<s%> [suffered,]
does not <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> but <S%G4796>rejoices<s%> with the <S%G225>truth;<s%>

<S%G26>Love<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G4098>fails;<s%> but <S%G1535>if<s%> [there are gifts of] <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> they will be <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away;<s%> <S%G1535>if<s%> [there are] <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> they will <S%G3973>cease;<s%> <S%G1535>if<s%> [there is] <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> it will be <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away.<s%>
For we <S%G1097>know<s%> in <S%G3313>part,<s%> and we <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> in <S%G3313>part;<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> I was a <S%G3516>child,<s%> I used to <S%G2980>speak<s%> as a <S%G3516>child,<s%> <S%G5426>think<s%> as a <S%G3516>child,<s%> <S%G3049>reason<s%> as a <S%G3516>child;<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G2673>did<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> with <S%G3516>childish<s%> things.

For <S%G737>now<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> in a <S%G2072>mirror<s%> <S%G135>dimly,<s%> but <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> to <S%G4383>face;<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> in <S%G3313>part,<s%> but <S%G5119>then<s%> I shall <S%G1921>know<s%> <S%G1921>fully<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> have been <S%G1921>fully<s%> <S%G1921>known.<s%>
